name: Kestrl: Muslim Money App
description: Kestrl is an app that helps Muslims to Budget, Save and Invest in line with their beliefs. Kestrl also offers SaaS services to Banks/Fintechs in the form of it's Personal Financial Management tools.
one_liner: Kestrl is an app that helps Muslims to Budget, Save and Invest in line with their beliefs. Kestrl also offers SaaS services to Banks/Fintechs in the form of it's Personal Financial Management tools.
